text:
@realDonaldTrump Reply with which you think it is?

1. #KimJongUn is dead 💀 
2. “Guys, I was kidding about injecting disinfectant”
3. COVID-19 is declared defeated! Now go back to work.
4. Decided to pardon #TigerKing Joe Exotic “he’s a good guy”.
5. Using guillotine is cure for brain cancer.
